website_summaries.verdict: Does a good job of providing a clog-free spray without a lot of pumping.
pros: Available in black, red, stainless, and white accent colors
Only needs to be primed, not re-pumped each time you use
cons: Read the instructions to make sure you are operating it correctly if you want a good mist spray

customer_reviews.title: and now it's just a nice looking bottle
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mister in February, and now it's just a nice looking bottle. I followed all the instructions perfectly and it worked very well at the beginning. However, after only a couple of months of use, the pump stopped working almost completely, so the spray is more like a lite mist, and the metallic cover slides off while I hold the bottle, which makes it very difficult to use. I have stopped using it completely. This is not a inexpensive item, yet it didn't last very long. I am surprised by all the positive reviews it has. I DO NOT RECOMMEND BUYING THIS MISTER.
customer_reviews.author: JMR

customer_reviews.title: is easy to fill
customer_reviews.text: This the nicest mister I have ever owned - and I have owned a few, including the ones highly rated by cooking sites. It doesn't require a lot of pumping, doesn't overspray, is easy to fill, doesn't get oily from spraying, feels comfortable in the hand ... and it looks very nice sitting on the countertop or on the table even though it spends its idle time on the pantry shelf away from the light. I read a lot of reviews before I purchased this mister - I wouldn’t hesitate to purchase one again, give one as a gift or recommend it to someone.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy V.

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: This oil mister broke the top neck of the glass portion off due to the pressure when it was just sitting on the counter. Glass went everywhere! Review update: after writing a bad review i was contacted shortly after by Gina. She understood that this could happen and recommended not leaving the pressure in the bottle. She issued me a full refund and sent me out another mister. I love this mister and Gina went out of her way to make sure things were corrected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have had mine for less than a year and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had mine for less than a year and pumped it about 4 times it exploded got a small splinter of glass in my hand should of taken picture . be careful this could of exploded in my eye>>
customer_reviews.author: p.b.

customer_reviews.title: This is by far the best mister I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best mister I have ever used. It is a perfect, fine spray every time (so far). I have tried many misters that only shoot a small stream of oil - no spray, no matter how many times you clean them with soapy water. As a comparison, the Fine Life mister worked perfectly for me only when it had water in it. As soon as I put a light oil in it, it returned to a stream every time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not very user-friendly in the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I’m sorry but this sprayer doesn’t work as well as it is advertised and described. A hassle to be honest. I never really give bad reviews and thoroughly research my purchases. Having to pump to spray a few times for one pan isn’t quite user friendly in the kitchen. I really thought this would be a better item. I would ask for a refund but at this point I would just assume pass and consider it an unnecessary purchase. Not made to be very functional in a my kitchen and cooking setting. Who knows if it ever clogs because I can only get 3 sprays befor I’m pumping again. Maybe it’s defective, I’m not quite sure.
customer_reviews.author: John W Snyder

customer_reviews.title: ... uses this mister a couple of times but i love the quality and spray pattern/amount each time
customer_reviews.text: I've only uses this mister a couple of times but i love the quality and spray pattern/amount each time. The quality can be felt and the glass makes a difference. I used to have a Misto and it was good at first but failed after some time. This sprayer feels more solid with a powerful spray after just a few quick pumps of air with the cap. It's a bit pricey but I hope the function and quality last and it will be worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Iza

customer_reviews.title: Underperforms with thicker liquids
customer_reviews.text: This works really, really well with water, and I give it points for it's pump system and consistent spray. But it simply doesn't perform with thicker liquids. When I load it with olive oil, it trickles out slowly and with low pressure, no matter how many times I pump it. When I switch it back to water, everything works like I want it to.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Chinese Glass -Exploded in the 1st 24 hrs.
customer_reviews.text: Placed oil in and pumped it up, used it and then placed in the cupboard, next morning opened the cupboard to exploded glass and oil all over. Clearly, the glass is of low quality. To circumvent the cheap glass, they do advise releasing the pressure, but we had used it already so wasn't thinking it would be a problem Basically, this thing is a pain if I must constantly pressurize and depressurize for safe storage. Moving on to another style!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pump doesn't work.  Nice size and packaging though (and cute photo of son and mom owner team)
customer_reviews.text: I received my ChefVantage olive oil mister today. I dutifully followed the operating instructions (remove rubber washer, etc) and filled the small jar 1/3 full of my favorite olive oil. My hopes were dashed the second I tried to use the device, as the white pump/spray nozzle didn't work. I tried emptying out the jar, putting the rubber washer back on, rinsing out the pump, etc. No good. Mister doesn't work. Back it goes. Disappointed. Seems like many others have had the same issue - whether right out of the gate, in the short run or long run. Pump is faulty. Son and Mom team (owners) may need to go back to the drawing board on this.
customer_reviews.author: KF

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, performs poorly
customer_reviews.text: Update: the company sent me a new insert piece and it works perfectly now. Followed l directions to a T and it still doesn't work. This is not our first oil mister (last one of a different brand fell to it's demise due to a "helpful" child). The lid constantly detaches from the sleeve that goes over the spray nozel. Reservoir is a little less than half full and no matter how much we pump, it won't spray more than a tiny fizzle. We always release the pressure when done (which is never much. We have given it many chances over the past couple of months, but I am done.
customer_reviews.author: N. M.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing performance
customer_reviews.text: This mister doesn't perform very well. It seems to be a catch-22. The instructions say to only put a small amount of oil in the reservoir to get maximum air pressure. This means you have to keep the mister essentially upright to keep the tube down in the oil. If you add more oil so that you can use the mister at a reasonable angle, then all the pumping in the world won't get you much spray time. It looks elegant but it is bordering on useless. Would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Pocofan

customer_reviews.title: Fails on the clock in 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: Had refilled it 2 to 3 times so far. Now not able to open it for refill. The surfaces are extra smooth and does not offer any grip. Tried counter clockwise does NOT budge. Tried Clockwise does not budge. One expensive use and throw product... More and more these products break. @Manufacturer. Can you please post a video of how to hold and open it ? and what to do when it is staled shut? Otherwise reduce every one's blood pressure and stop selling this product. Thanks Mahesh
customer_reviews.author: Mahesh R. Rajannan

customer_reviews.title: Do not use olive oil in this - it will clog.
customer_reviews.text: The mister clogged immediately with extra virgin olive oil, leaving me with a dripping nozzle. I used it in the presence of a chef who told me these misters are notorious for not working with heavier oils. Instead it's only good for lighter oils like grape seed oil.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Beauregard

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I, like another reviewer here, can't get it to spray. It won't even move! Ive checked everything because I hate having to send it back! I'll just buy a regular spray bottle.
customer_reviews.author: S. Del Rio Rancho

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: Not safe. Blew up in my wife’s hand and spread glass 15 ft. Really liked it up until now. She was spraying and had stopped to pump and it blew.
customer_reviews.author: texman

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!
customer_reviews.text: Finally I get to use this item. Took out of box. Seemed all intact. Simple directions for using. Does not pump. Can't spray. Thought turning the sprayer right or left, like medical spray bottles, to unlock. NO! Put in olive oil, thinking it needed to be filled. NO! does not work. A waste of time and money. Am I going to return it, NO. Sometimes it is easier to just chuck it. Go to Home Depot ang get a small plastic spray bottle, holds s lot and costs noting.
customer_reviews.author: Lucinda Silloway

customer_reviews.title: Meh! I have to keep pumping the top to get the mist
customer_reviews.text: As I said in the intro, I have to keep pumping the top to get the mist. The most lasts for about 5 seconds and then you gotta pump it again. If I knew this, I would have bought something else
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Over a year and still misting!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only mister I have owned that still mists after a year of heavy usage. We use this mister daily and it is awesome. No clogs at all. Additionally, the seller stands behind their product. Even though I was outside the warranty period, they are sending me a replacement part that likely wore due to our heavy usage. Initially I hesitated to buy this because the price was more than I wanted to spend for a mister and as well, based on previous experiences, I did not expect it to last long. It has held up very well and has been well worth the money. Plus, misting actual olive oil tastes way better than aerosol based sprays!
customer_reviews.author: xBryMilx

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This was not a good item, it was hard to clean and then putting it back together was difficult- the spray is inconsistent and you have to pump it which is just annoying. I am throwing it away and buying another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Ngos

customer_reviews.title: Better donate the money than throw it away buying this
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could rate it with none star, because it doesn’t deserve it. The worse way to lose 25dlls, I wouldn’t feel that bad if I dropped the money on the street because at least someone who need it could use it. Nothing comes at all from the stray, no water and of course NOT OIL (the main reason that I got this for) not even drops! Totally waiste if money and energy. I live outside of US so I don’t have any way to return this piece of expensive trash
customer_reviews.author: Kattia

customer_reviews.title: Great for a couple of months.
customer_reviews.text: Not too sure what to say, but after a few months this sprayer would no longer build up pressure when pumped. In addition, much like other oil sprayers I have used, it seemed to leak and leave a mess wherever placed. The concept is good but until someone figures out how to design and oil sprayer that will last more than a hot minute, I will have to go back to the less desirable commercial alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about this
customer_reviews.text: I'm on the fence about this one. I chose it because it was an Amazon Choice pick. However, I have my reservations about it. It seems I have to pump an awful lot to get it to spray on my food. I'm going to keep it because I'm hoping I'm just doing something wrong, but I do find myself reaching for the olive oil in the can which sprays out a lot faster and covers a lot better without having to pump the can to get it out.
customer_reviews.author: D. Owens

customer_reviews.title: It Has Never Clogged
customer_reviews.text: Pros: The shape is nice. It works fine after more than two years of use. It has never clogged. Allows you to use whatever oil you want. Non-aerosol = better for the environment and our health. Cons: The spray is not as robust as what you get from an aerosol can. You have to pump before each use. We're reasonably happy with this cooking sprayer as it's durable and gets the job done. If I had to purchase another one, I might try for something that gives you stronger spray per pump.
customer_reviews.author: Juniper

customer_reviews.title: It imploded!!!
customer_reviews.text: We loved this kitchen gadget. We used it almost everyday. I bought it after using my parents' over Christmas. We are an adult household so I know it was not being used improperly. Today, I refilled it and after a spray I pumped it one time and it imploded. Glass and oil everywhere. I had to throw away the meal. I'm sad because I really loved this product but it was pricy for it imploding after just a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small sprayer that works well
customer_reviews.text: I previously owned a Misto oil sprayer. Eventually it clogged as oil dried in the nozzle. These really use very little oil when they spray, which means you don't want them to hold a lot. They need to cleaned fairly frequently and if they hold too much, the oil will have time to dry. This is the perfect size. The main drawback to having a small bottle is having to pump more frequently to pressurize it, but the pump is easy to use and gives you a nice long spray. Used mainly for popcorn; a light spray of oil is just enough to get salt to stick.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hopwood

customer_reviews.title: The 1st one didn't work, but the new one they sent works great!
customer_reviews.text: Revised Review: The seller proactively sent me a new oil mister based on my original review (see below). The new mister works better than I expected it would. This one seems like a quality product with great performance (oil pressure). So, I revised my review from 1 star to 4 stars based on performance of the new mister, and the sellers response and desire to provide a working product. Old Review: It doesn’t work at all. I took it out of the box, assembled it, filled it, and it never worked. Tried multiple times, etc...
customer_reviews.author: Craig Mallow

customer_reviews.title: Good sprayer, outstanding customer service, and the bronze unit is gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned two of these for a year and a half. I’ve had a couple of problems with the pumps, but when I contacted the company, suggesting the pump be replaced, I got an almost immediate reply and a complete replacement within a day or two. The product was out of warranty and I offered to pay for a replacement part, but Gina & the boys sent a brand-new sprayer without hesitation. I'd had a red one and a black one, but they’re not available, so I chose the bronze. The photos don't do it justice; it’s beautiful, rich & lustrous.
customer_reviews.author: Pieter B

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good so far
customer_reviews.text: I've used the mister with olive oil a few times and am pleased with the fine mist it products. However, a certain amount of the mist gets lost in the air instead of landing on the pan, but it's not a big deal. It only takes about 10 pumps to evenly cover a large frying pan with about the same consistency as the canned sprayers you buy in the store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have decided I like the product
customer_reviews.text: After owning the item for several weeks, which i purchased because of the positive reviews, I have decided I don't like the product. Unfortunately, it was also the most expensive oil sprayer. Despite pumping the pumper 20-30 times, the spray is weak and only lasts a few seconds. I will have to purchase another sprayer but of a different brand. Not impressed. Edited review: A new item was sent to me by the company without my having to ask with a nice note and more detailed instructions on how clean the item initially and use it. The new item works as expected. Impressed by the customer service from the company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mister with limited life span
customer_reviews.text: Was great while it lasted, which wasn't even a year. Like others, the little lip of plastic on the plunger broke, so no way to build pressure to spray. I'm not Mr. Muscles either, but perhaps I'm pumping too hard. Updated to 4 stars: The company sent out a new one with no hassles, I didn't even have to send the old one back, 5 star customer service. I wish the lip of the plunger was a bit stouter, I worry about pumping too much pressure into the sprayer and breaking it again. But it's working again, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: bossturbo

customer_reviews.title: Great mister and amazing customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I originally wrote a one star review of this mister. I had bought two and couldn’t get either to build up pressure to spray oil. In response to my review, the company contacted me by email and apologized that I was not satisfied. Without my asking, they refunded the price of one mister and sent me a replacement for the other!!! This one works brilliantly! I absolutely love the mister and think the customer service is phenomenal! I use it daily along with my air fryer to make great food.
customer_reviews.author: GeeBLateTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: Oil sprays onto the bottle itself
customer_reviews.text: The overall design is good. However, the spray head is too short while the bottle is too wide. Consequently, the oil sprays onto the bottle itself, which you need to wipe off after each use (in the photo you can see oil droplets right in front of the spray head). It would be a perfect product if they could have their spray head stick out a little bit more. ========================update================= The seller have given me a full refund for the complaint above, and that was totally out of my expectation. I have changed the review from 3 star to 4 star. If I could separately review their customer service and product, I will give their customer service 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Qihan Liu

customer_reviews.title: Love the product and appreciate the prompt and helpful response from the seller to a question.
customer_reviews.text: I like the mist. does what is supposed to do. Good quality materials. Had a question about how to the operate the sprayer and contacted the seller at the e-mail on the box. I received a helpful reply with info and a video within hours. I would certainly purchase from their product line again.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great owners and customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Update: Have to say I'm thoroughly impressed by the owner. They really do care about their customers and made sure I was taken care of--an absolute rarity in the modern day. Thank you Gina! Leaves much to be desired. It doesn't work first of all. I followed the directions on the box as well as what was sent via email. I had to pump this thing 50+ times just for it to leak out of the nozzle. Second the actuation mechanism/travel time is so little, you're not even sure if you're pressing the nozzle. Quite disappointing since I've spent time researching oil misters before pulling the trigger on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this item. I really did. However, after a few uses, it no longer will prime to spray. I cleaned it (no easy task) thinking it was clogged and it still doesn’t work. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: AMY L STINE

customer_reviews.title: fell from 5 feet onto hard tile floor, did not break
customer_reviews.text: I have now been using this for 9 months, and love it. I *had* to write a review today, since I just dropped it about five feet (my clumsiness) onto our hard tile floor. It was not damaged in *any* way, and I was so thankful that I didn't have a horrendous oily mess to clean up, and that I wouldn't have to buy another one! This is a true testament to the high quality construction of this product!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Carol JVF Burns

customer_reviews.title: Works good. Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: This mister works great. Did not want to use the propellant sprays from the store and this works just right for my intentions. Plus it's easy to infuse or clean. It does a good job of applying just the right amount of oil. I use it mainly with the air fryer though it can be used anytime you need an oil. The pump is easy to use. Ten to fifteen pumps and you’re good to go. I had a small problem with it spraying correctly in the beginning due to a spray part but the seller promptly took care of the problem with a new piece sent to me immediately and followed up to make sure I was satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: 100% Quality
customer_reviews.text: Been using this sprayer for several days (about 10 meals)... I have it loaded with a high quality EVOO. It sprays in a perfect mist. Something I have never seen from any of the MANY sprayers I have owned over the past 20 years. I would recommend this sprayer to anyone who wants a quality sprayer that is easy to clean. It was packaged perfectly as well. The bowl holding the oil is glass. It's super easy to use as well. It's easy to pump using the dome lid. Awesome find... Awesome item. Thanks to the designers.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Johnson

customer_reviews.title: BEST Customer Service and spritzer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a year ago, and loved it. Much better than the Misto or other brands. The other day I used it and left it on the counter and the top exploded off. Im guessing because of too much pressure. I contacted the company, and I gotta tell you, I wish more companies cared about their customers like they do. They immediately credited my account for the mister, and then sent me a new one!! Plus an additional credit!! I highly recommend purchasing from this Chefvantage.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: Exploded
customer_reviews.text: I initially loved this product, until the steel cap came unglued from the plastic base and you couldn't open it anymore. The company replaced that one for free. The second one blew up in our kitchen today- didn't shatter, just a clean glass break that left the top part of the glass still screwed into the lid. The lid blew off when no one was around, but it left me thinking this product is probably not safe.
customer_reviews.author: Matt B

customer_reviews.title: Second time’s a charm
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this product, but mine has never produced a fine mist, it just sort of sputters and never enough for a whole pan. Maybe I received a defective unit. Update: I received a second unit and this one sprays very nicely. It’s a big step up from the disposable oil sprays. Great customer service and I’d recommend the sprayer.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: annoying. So after each use I have to wash ...
customer_reviews.text: The spray of the oil (I use brown rice oil) is just right for pan and the TFal grill I use. The one concern is when I hold the mister with my index finger on the pump the brushed metal cover moves up and sometimes covers some of the must and the oil drips on the glass and metal cover. I can’t get the metal cover to stop sliding up, annoying. So after each use I have to wash it under running hot water.
customer_reviews.author: Jin Tai

customer_reviews.title: Nice, But Takes Work
customer_reviews.text: This company has EXCELLENT customer service. They will do anything to make the customer happy. I've been looking for a glass mister for olive oil and apple cider and balsamic vinegar. The CHEFVANTAGE looks great, is durable, and constructed well. However, you constantly have to pump in order for it to spray. Would I purchase again... NO. There are other misters that are less expensive. If I have to work this hard [pumping action], I'd prefer to spend less money. And, one company has a life time guarantee.
customer_reviews.author: SAG

customer_reviews.title: Great product and even better customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Our mister had been working fantastic for nearly a year. Just a few weeks shy of the 1 year, it suddenly stopped building up any pressure to spray. I contacted the seller about the issue and received a very quick response. She provided helpful documentation to ensure we were using it properly, and also ensured us she would replace it from the defective item. Just a few days later, I had a new oil mister in the mail, and two additional pumps to replace in case they have issues. I am BLOWN AWAY on this customer service - top notch for sure! Thank you so much Gina, really impressed. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Worst spray bottle on the market in my opinion.
customer_reviews.text: This item is neither premium nor usable. You have to pump it every time you use. Sometimes you have to pump it twice for one use. Sometimes instead of spray it dispenses the stream. But the worst part is that it’s always oily and greasy. Disgusting. You need to wash your hands after using it because the oil is all over the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Uliana

customer_reviews.title: Get ready to pump
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the price. Takes a lot of pumping to get a good spray of oil. Otherwise, sputters and spits. The exterior gets very oily and requires constantly cleaning. Just not worth it for all the maintenance and pumping. Spray 2 seconds, pump 10 seconds. Not a time saver by any stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Plume

customer_reviews.title: Great sprayer. Great customer  service!! You can't  go wrong  with this product
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best sprayers I have used. In a house where I cook for a family of 9 I do alot ALOT of cooking. This sprayer gets used every day for several meals and is is perfect. I had an issue where the glass broke. Someone must have used it and didnt release the air when they were done with it. Anyway it broke I reached out to the company and they took care of this for me. They replaced it with out any issues. Great customer service! Even before my issue, this product was the best sprayer I have ever used. I would highly recomend this sprayer.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Excellent olive (or other) oil misting bottle
customer_reviews.text: I love this a lot, especially compared to another brand (Misto) because it works better and also looks better. It sprays oil much more consistently and evenly and because of its shape, is much easier to clean. Caveat: only had it a little over a month so I’m not sure about it’s durability. But I did get one for my brother who buys those disposable veg oil misters at the grocery (a definite environmental faux pas, lol!). So far, it’s all good!
customer_reviews.author: Luchador

customer_reviews.title: Great quality mister and exceptional customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great oil mister that is well constructed and easy to use!! My wife was so excited when she got hers and loves to use it! Great for misting food before air frying! Also a great way to apply oil to a salad to get an even covering! :UPDATE- we experienced a problem with the mister after about a year of use and contacted the seller directly who responded literally within minutes and gave suggestions how to unclog the sprayer system. I followed their suggestions and it’s working beautifully again! GREAT customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Djduane

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product with high hopes only to have them dashed in a short time. After 3 uses, the pump part stopped working. I am disappointed in this product!
customer_reviews.author: Regina O'Flaherty

customer_reviews.title: Love it! You won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: To be honest...when I bought it I thought it seemed too good to be true. I’ve used others and they are cheap and break easily. Well I can’t tell you how much I love this mister! I even waited a month to write a review just do I could test it out. It’s so great! Eating healthier just got a whole lot easier!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny and then some more
customer_reviews.text: This is sooo worth the extra money. I know, I know, yes, you can buy an oil mister for cheaper but, trust me, you will get what you pay for....a piece of junk. THIS oil mister, on the other hand, works absolutely without fail. No clogging, no dripping, nice even spray. Solidly built, and a beautiful design. It's just one of those rare "I'll keep it for life" products that really works well. That's unusual in it-broke, it-doesn't-work, what-a-waste-of-money, throw-it-out consumer world.
customer_reviews.author: Chriis Evans

customer_reviews.title: Do not fill the container more than half full of olive oil.
customer_reviews.text: If you fill the jar more than half way, it can not & won't build up pressure. The instructions say to fill it to the fill line. I don't see a fill line. I would like to highly recommend this product, although it isn't listed #1 in the Best Misters or sprays, I like it real well.
customer_reviews.author: Delores Van Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturing defect or design flaw...
customer_reviews.text: I had been happily using this product for about 6 months, and then last week after refilling with olive oil and giving the mister a few pumps, the glass bottle broke, sending glass and oil all over my kitchen counter. This mister had not been dropped or mistreated in any way, and I had only pumped it a few times. Nothing excessive. The glass bottle appears unable to withstand the internal pressure created by normal home use. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: eyes88

customer_reviews.title: Was great for a year, then shattered while sitting on the shelf
customer_reviews.text: So this sprayer worked really well compared to several others I've had over the years. Then one day, just after filling it, I set it on the shelf, and about 10 minutes later, heard a pop. I thought it had fallen over, but in reality, the stop part of the glass bottle sheared off. There is a photo of a similar incident with another customer. I'd already thrown mine out when I came on Amazon to select a new one and figured I would check it out to see whether this had happened to others. Yep. I'm giving it a 2-star overall rating, because for a little less than a year, it worked well.
customer_reviews.author: D. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately broke after 6 months of use
customer_reviews.text: This item broke after 6 months of light use. The plastic piece in the center used to pump to create the pressure cracked in a very odd location. I paid more for what I thought would be a more quality product, but unfortunately this was not the case.
customer_reviews.author: AC257

customer_reviews.title: Considering getting another
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil sprayer. I also thank the company for posting a video on how to use it cuz I didn't understand you needed to pump air into it to get it working. I thought it was defective but it was just the user. ;o) I have just received it, so haven't used it much yet but I know it's going to be just want I needed. I sometimes would add too much oil since it would come out of the bottle so quickly. This is going to make it so easy to not over do the oil and to coat food more easily. I'm thinking of getting a 2nd one and garlic to the oil.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: What an oil mister should be
customer_reviews.text: The first time using this mister, I didn't pump the cap quite enough, so the oil did not come out as a mist. In fact, it dribbled a little from the nozzle -- very disappointing. However, the second time and thereafter, I made sure to pump the cap enough to increase the air pressure inside the glass bottle, and voila! Beautiful oil mist! No mess, no oil blobs. The glass bottle proved a bit slippery to hold onto, so a couple of rubber bands around the glass helped tremendously. No more slipping out of my hands. Thank you for an excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Failed after several uses
customer_reviews.text: After the first few uses when it didn't work well it began to work very well and I was happy with it. Then after about 30 uses it failed completely. I heard something break, maybe something plastic, and now it doesn't work at all. So I have to throw it out. Too bad, it was very nice while it worked. I'll buy a different brand and see it that one lasts longer.
customer_reviews.author: Rodger Philips

customer_reviews.title: Saves Oil and Health Advantage
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this purchase and with the Customer Service. I contacted them after having some confusion on the proper filling and usage of the mister. Have been using it for almost a year now. I do not go through bottles of olive oil as I used to. I am in the process of buying one or two more for my family that is coming to visit from overseas. They are coming from a place with a lot of food shortages, and saving oil will be a blessing.
customer_reviews.author: AGLEZ

customer_reviews.title: Love this item
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact we are using our good quality olive oil to spray on cookware rather than the spray aerosol cans you buy in the grocery stores. I also use this to spray food items in my air fryer. I have to admit, though, I had to go online to read about how you get it to spray. I didn't know about the pumping until I read the question and answer section online. I couldn't find these instructions packaged with the item. Maybe I overlooked them. I do love this item and I love that it matches our other stainless steel items in our kitchen. It looks classy enough to leave out on the counter. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: joiz

customer_reviews.title: Best Mister Ever, Best Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I love this mister. It sprays for a few seconds so you don't have to pump the pressure back up so frequently like the other misters. I like the fact that you can see the oil level in the glass jar. It fits well into my hand, is easy to hold. I couldn't get the mister to work, at first. Turned out to be user-error and NOT a product defect. The company reached out to me immediately and then sent me a "tested" replacement sprayer. Outstanding product from a company that provides outstanding customer service. Definite 5 star rating for both!!!
customer_reviews.author: WenDZ

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasts. A couple months tops.
customer_reviews.text: Loved it while it worked. It worked for a few weeks and now nothing more than a slight squirt comes out. What a shame cause I really did like it. Update - after submitting this review I was contacted by Gina's Family with a replacement. I didn't even ask for it! They really stand behind their product, and I'm happy about that because like I said, I really do like the mister. They really should look into changing the little mechanism that all the complaints are about I'm 100% sure they would have 5 stars ll around. Thanks again!
customer_reviews.author: Truth be told

customer_reviews.title: Spits, not spray... Lots of pumping!
customer_reviews.text: This thing takes a lot of pumping for just a few seconds of spraying... and it's not a very fine spray, more like spittle. I've tried it with different types of oils and it spits with all of them. Save your money and buy one of the manual spray bottles.
customer_reviews.author: TrekSurfer

customer_reviews.title: I can't even use this
customer_reviews.text: I can't use this, it will not pump away all
customer_reviews.author: P Austin

customer_reviews.title: Exploded!
customer_reviews.text: The product looked good and it was easy to use. As expected it was not so easy to clean as the parts in plastic are difficult to wash. This was not an issue. However, after about 6 months I had it, I heard a noise in the kitchen. The glass bottle had exploded under its own pressure. Lucky nobody was around. Pieces of glass were everywhere. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Stefania S

customer_reviews.title: Great product and service
customer_reviews.text: When I first got it, had problems with the spray. It wasn’t the fine mist I had expected and the pressure didn’t last long. I contacted the company and they sent a replacement part, as well as instructions on the best way to pump and prime it. It now works perfectly. It is beautiful, works well, and the customer service was top notch. They contacted me several times to be sure that all was well. Would definitely recommend both the mister and the company!
customer_reviews.author: Debra L. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe Product
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the glass apparently can’t withstand the amount of air pressure the air seal is capable of containing. The top shattered right off and glass splinters fell into the oil. However it was very good while it lasted. Need to leave a bit of an air pocket to be effective. I filled this to the top the first time and it became a squirt gun - no atomizing air pressure.
customer_reviews.author: A. H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I broke the first one I received when I poured cold water on it right after boiling it hot water. I asked for a new product for free although the first one breaking was my own fault. Gina & family promised to send me a new one for free and indeed they did. The product is working as expected, and I am grateful for the service I received.
customer_reviews.author: Jung

customer_reviews.title: Store your oil in glass before you spray!
customer_reviews.text: I love having a glass sprayer for my olive oil, instead of the more common aluminum sprayers. The product works great once you pump it enough. It holds its pressure overnight easily. If you don't mind pumping it up, this is a great solution for obtaining a fine layer of oil on your cooking surfaces. Excellent customer service when a part on mine came loose as well! My friend bought one and it is also working beautifully for her.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: We bought one and after a short test bought a second one. We have been using them for 4 months and absolutely love them. The glass bottle is so much easier to clean than plastic alternatives. Pump action works better than others we have used in the past. Spouse asked me to add that neither of these misters have clogged after months of use.
customer_reviews.author: D. Byrd

customer_reviews.title: Works well, doesn't clog
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first because of previous experience with similar products clogging after a few uses and requiring constant cleaning, but I have been using this oil sprayer for months with both extra virgin olive oil and avocado oil and it works like a charm and has never clogged. Solid, high quality product!
customer_reviews.author: D. Horne

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Fantastic customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, it works exactly as I expected. Customer service was fantastic, I sent an email and they responded within an hour. If you are like me and have never used one of these before, keep in mind that you need to pump it a few times to get the oil to spray out in a mist. There is a you tube video with instructions on how to do this if you need.
customer_reviews.author: Breland Smith

customer_reviews.title: it can spray a great mist but most of the time its a stream
customer_reviews.text: we bought this because we are trying to use olive oil for most of our cooking and the store bought spray bottles spray a stream rather then a mist.. ive had the product for a few months now. it can spray a great mist but most of the time its a stream, you do need to pump it 10 to 15 times each time you use it, now the plunger that is supposed to hang on to the cap has come unglued and gets stuck every time you pump. its a great idea it look great on the counter top but it is not yet perfected.
customer_reviews.author: bryan

customer_reviews.title: A very functional design
customer_reviews.text: Works as described with very polished construction. My only complaint is that it needs to be nearly vertical to insure the take-up port is submerged. If I tip it sideways to spray a pan for instance, I get only a tube's worth of oil before the tube fills with air. I personally don't see a design way around that limitation, but it is easy to right the sprayer, depress the nozzle, and allow the tube to refill. A nice addition would be to have a dual use nozzle - one position for mist, another for a stream.
customer_reviews.author: Epignathus

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have used this 3-4 times now. It is absolutely awesome. No problems whatsoever. It sprays a very fine mist after 6-7 pumps. Yes, you have to pump it to make it work but it takes no time at all and it really works great. I bought this to use with my air fryer. You spray the top of chicken or pork chops with it. It gives it extra browning power. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy T.

customer_reviews.title: Company that stands by their product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product and absolutely loved it...but, after a short time it stopped spraying. However, when I reached out to customer service about my issue they immediately sent a replacement pump that was likely the culprit and whoala it’s working again! This is a company that not only stands by their product they also provide exceptional customer service and follow up!
customer_reviews.author: Mar G.

customer_reviews.title: Glad I picked this one
customer_reviews.text: I needed a touch of oil in my non-stick frypans and was throwing a lot away by spreading and wiping with a towel. I am also using my air fryer more and didn't like the way my store-bought sprayer squirted oil out. I decided to get an oil mister but found a great deal of choices for which the reviews were variable and prices were all over the lot. I decided on the CHEFVANTAGE and found they have a 100% satisfaction guarantee. It allows me to put a fine mist of olive oil into my frypans or on food going into my air fryer. It appears to be well-made and is just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. James E. Burr, CHA

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I use a lot of olive oil and I wanted a mister and after doing some research and wanting something that had style, I came upon this product. Even coating which for me with garlic bread or my air fryer is really important. Good Buy!
customer_reviews.author: It's me...

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful customer service
customer_reviews.text: I like the ease of use to spray olive oil on chicken and potatoes so they are a nice crisp. Before I had to coat them and it was just too much oil. This puts out a nice, even spray. I emailed customer service on Saturday and they got back to me the same day and referred me to several user videos that answered all my questions. Great compny, will do business with them again.
customer_reviews.author: JEB

customer_reviews.title: Broke First Day
customer_reviews.text: Broke first day, the threaded collar separated from the glass, so there was no way to seal it. It was the first Amazon recommended item that disappointed, that was the only reason I chose this type.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: with a nice, firm
customer_reviews.text: The first Oil Mister arrived was a faulty, previously used item that was inadvertently sent out from Amazon by mistake. When the seller realized what had happened they sent out a new one immediately. I have not had the opportunity yet, to use it yet with oil or vinegar, but when I washed it with hot soap and water, and tested it - it worked perfectly, as described, with a nice, firm, even mist. Wonderful - this is such a cool invention; so far I am happy with it. I am sure I am going to like using this a lot. It is attractive, and being glass and stainless - so far it seems extremely easy to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: CWAM

customer_reviews.title: Just stopped working!  Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a nice, glass sprayer for orange oil. This particular item is clearly not what I needed. After just two satisfying sprays the nozzle, for lack of a better description, just locked up. It will no longer depress. I've tried taking it apart, washing out the sprayer, pumping it more and fewer times - nothing works. I did a lot of research to be sure I'd gotten the perfect sprayer - this one definitely is not it. Nothing premium about it except the price. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Averbeck

customer_reviews.title: I cannot recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this. Got it. It never worked, from right out of the box. Unable to develop pressure to spray olive oil. Also, the vendor had placed a card in the box to say something like "if you have problems, contact us, not Amazon". I went to their website and they had an email address for customer service. I emailed them. The email bounced back saying that it was not a valid address.
customer_reviews.author: Bob G.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last more than a few months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in March. We use olive oil a lot for cooking, baking, and grilling. This product sounded superior to others, and the reviews were great too, so I chose this from many other options. The reviews were great too, We were extremely satisfied with the product for three months. We had followed the directions and refilled it twice, washing all parts thoroughly before refilling. On our 4th attempt to open and refill, we are unable to open the bottle to clean and refill. I have looked online and found nothing that allows us to open. Very sad, because we used this almost daily.
customer_reviews.author: daniel forero

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: In the beginning, the mister didn't work well and I was a bit disappointed. However, the seller sent me an email asking me if I liked the mister. I explained my problem and she decided to send me a replacement of the sprayer. I got the sprayer and indeed everything works now. I have a beautiful mister spraying olive oil. Thank you Gina and Family.
customer_reviews.author: SewingDiva

customer_reviews.title: Quality product backed by great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for! For use in cooking when I want a light spray of the olive oil of my choosing and not the questionable contents in the aerosol cans. After I received my mister, I had a little start-up trouble, but an email to the owners of the company brought an immediate response. She gave me some instruction and encouragement, and I am successfully using the mister as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: shortcake

customer_reviews.title: It'll build up the pressure it needs and sprays just fine.
customer_reviews.text: A little tricky at first, but I figured it out. If yours doesn't spray, fill it only 3/4 full, pop the cap on, and pump the cap up and down 6-8 times. It'll build up the pressure it needs and sprays just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Lee E. Walkowski

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This oil mister dissapointed. It does not spray as well or as long as the last one I had which I gave to my son & wife. Wish I had bought the same model I gave away; but thought I would try this one. It cost more than my previous mister & does not work as well. I was not planning on reviewing this. I don't often write negative reviews, but tbe company kept sending me emails hounding me to write a review.
customer_reviews.author: HappyGranny

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Exceptional Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: 2 things - The product works well. Keeps misting rather than eventually streaming like most misters do. I did run into a problem with the unit and sent a note to the seller on a Saturday night fully expecting not to hear from them until Monday - and would have been perfectly fine with that. But instead, I got a fantastic response from them within 2 hours - and a replacement unit delivered within 2 days. So a) a great product that functions as advertised (and looks good too) and b) Exceptional customer service. Can’t ask for more. Thanks Gina!
customer_reviews.author: RZ

customer_reviews.title: Love this mister.
customer_reviews.text: I used to use commercial oil sprayer from the grocery store until I found out that they contain some chemical that is not good to use with air fryers. I bought this to spray a small around of oil when needed with the air fryer and it works beautifully. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JMKnox

customer_reviews.title: This oil mister is a big Hit!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this olive oil mister as a stocking stuffer for my wife for Christmas...she loves it! We used it for the first time tonight and the way my wife was spraying the skillet and telling me how well it was working with distributing and not using too much oil..well I thought I was watching an infomercial! 5 stars!! I would give it more stars if I could!
customer_reviews.author: Marty P

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I was recently diagnosed with a soy allergy. All cooking sprays contain soy and I was trying to find something else I could use to spray olive oil with. I came across this device and am so glad I did. It works great and I wish I would have started using this sooner. It’s great to be able to use just olive oil instead of all the junk contained in a conventional non-stick spray. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Emily S

customer_reviews.title: Great Oil Mister
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil mister. I followed the instructions they sent me and after pumping it up it sprayed the oil great. I had a different on which I liked but it may spray twice and then quit, I'd wait a few minutes or unscrew the top and spray a few more times. This one is a pump where you have to air it up but so far it works great. This helps so much in getting just enough oil on my food but not to much. Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Denise L. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this oil mister for over a year now. You know even healthy fats can add up calories. With this mister, you can control how much you use in your salad, or when you have to grill your meat, seafood, or even your veggies. This mister has an overall even spray, does not give out a glop of oil on your food. No clogging. It also looks great to leave it out on your counter. Thank you for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: A mister that really works
customer_reviews.text: This is the first mister I've had that actually worked exactly as promised. The directions were clear about how much oil to put in and what the air you pumped in did. Once air was pumped in, it continued to work after periods of non-use. The mister did not have to be held at a particular angle to work properly. I really hate using commercial cooking sprays, but sometimes just a fine mist of oil is what you really need. Until I got this mister, I'd typically pour a small amount of oil into a pan and then wipe it out with paper toweling, but this is a much nicer, less wasteful solution.
customer_reviews.author: M. Burke

customer_reviews.title: A product of great quality.
customer_reviews.text: A product of great quality, I love the possibility of using flavored oil without risk, it offers many possibilities of use, very good design and final completion, worthy of a precious gift, my daughter will use it soon and I am sure she will love it. The attention from the manufacturers has been very good, sending comments for better use, I am very satisfied with this product and I would buy it again to use it with other liquids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well and saves money over aerosol sprays.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I was tired of buying oil sprays in aerosol cans. This saves money and is better for the environment. It works great. There are not a lot of instructions with it, and it should be easy to figure out, but when I first tried it, I thought it was broke. I watched the quick online video about it, and I was not pumping it correctly... My fault, duh... Press down (Pump) the clear plastic lid, not the white button. I highly recommend this sprayer.
customer_reviews.author: Blake E Myers

customer_reviews.title: This family-owned CPG company provides the best customer service I have ever seen.
customer_reviews.text: The Oil Mister is great. While I did experience some difficulty getting it to work, the co-founder of the company responded immediately to my outreach, offered a full refund, and provided a complete product replacement. The product works very well now, and being able to control the distribution and amount of oil I use when cooking has enabled me to have a much more consistent cooking experience than ever before.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

product_meta.title: Premium Olive Oil Mister and Cooking Sprayer with Clog-Free Filter and Glass Bottle by CHEFVANTAGE - Stainless Steel
product_meta.description:
Color:Stainless SteelCHEFVANTAGE's Olive Oil Mister Is The Healthy Alternative To Store-Bought Cooking Sprays

We understand why people choose the convenience of cooking sprays, but which is more important - saving a few seconds or eating a healthy diet?

Because while big-name brand cooking sprays may have zero calories, they often contain questionable ingredients that are likely neither organic nor even natural.

Given a choice, wouldn't you rather use something like pure organic olive oil, with no additives?

And here's what you may not realize - cooking and eating healthily needn't be a time-consuming activity.

Introducing Our CHEFVANTAGE Oil Mister

The refillable glass chamber means you can use whatever oil you prefer, whether it's your favorite brand of olive oil, coconut oil, or something else.

Or you could use it to:

* spritz lemon juice on your fish, or spray it on fruit to keep it fresh

* add some fresh herbs and make an infused oil or vinegar

* even put water in and use it on your BBQ

You're limited only by your own imagination and willingness to experiment and have fun!

Clog-Free Filter

Even if you do use fresh herbs, this mister will never clog thanks to its unique filter.

Nothing to Worry About

We don't use an aerosol with dangerous propellants - just a simple air pressure pump mechanism with a super-fine nozzle to coat your food and your pans evenly and lightly.

Easy To Clean

The oil chamber is made from glass, which is scratch-resistant, anti-bacterial, and easy to wash, while the top, which cunningly hides the pump from view, is durable stainless steel.

Risk-Free

We want you be 100% happy with your purchase, which is why we offer a manufacturer's one-year satisfaction guarantee.

Get Your CHEFVANTAGE Oil Mister Today And Enjoy A Healthier, Fun Way To Eat
feature_bullets: THE HEALTHY ALTERNATIVE TO COOKING SPRAYS - While store-bought cooking sprays are convenient, you don't really know what's in them. That's not a problem with our refillable CHEFVANTAGE oil mister, because you get to use whatever ingredients you want.

VERSATILE - It's great for most types of oil (e.g. olive, coconut), as well as vinegars, juices, or even water. For example, fill it with lemon juice and spritz a salmon steak or spray it on fruit to keep it fresh.
NO CLOGGING - Our mister won't clog, even if you add fresh herbs, say, to infuse your own oils or vinegars, thanks to its special anti-clog filter.

EASY TO USE - Because this uses a non-aerosol air pressure pump mechanism, you do need to prime it with a few pumps to get it going. From then on, a super-fine spray will give your food or pans an even coating, every time - and use less oil, which is healthier for you and your family too.

ELEGANT, PRACTICAL DESIGN - The oil chamber is made from scratch-resistant glass, which is also anti-bacterial and easy to clean, while the pump is cleverly hidden from view inside the stainless steel top. And our manufacturer's one-year satisfaction guarantee makes this a risk-free purchase.
